document.full_text: a california man who was the first person indicted under a law passed after the september 11, 2001 attacks that bans importing missiles able to shoot down airplanes, was sentenced on monday to 25 years in prison.
document.title: man sentenced for trying to smuggle missiles from china
lines_and_colors: a california man who was the first person indicted under a law passed after the september 11, 2001 attacks that bans importing missiles able to shoot down airplanes, was sentenced on monday to 25 years in prison.
